further-information-required.html_body: Please provide further information to your case {{ case.Reference }}
further-information-required.subject: Further information required
further-information-required.title: Further information required

closed-no-response.html_body:
Hello,

We have not recieved any information regarding this and therefore are closing this requrest - please feel free to raise another, when you have all the information required.
closed-no-response.subject: Closed No Response {{ case.Reference }}
closed-no-response.title: Closed No Response
